title: Pose Episode 6 Love is the Message Review
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: This was the most emotional episode of all. I litterally sobbed. In all the emo scenes.
Yes it was her voice. She sings so beautifully

First, remember, if you are HIV positive, make sure the other person knows before getting laid. Second, AIDS has not been cured. People with HIV spend lots of money for drugs like AZT to keep them alive. In some ways I feel like the show gives the impression that this disease was an 80s thing, it just isn’t given the attention it used to get, it is still out there and I don’t know if there is a cure in site. Use condoms, but remember, condoms can and do break among other things. Be careful everyone.
It reminded of friends that are not with us anymore. And i am from this era which is why it touched me so hard. I hear you getting emo Mary in some of the reviews. I GET IT.
Blanca was Angel in Rent at one time.
